mmm so when I was in like elementary school like

you know this was great 1 grade 2 in front of 
my school there's a little bicycle cart that

sell this up in the way it works is you put in a 
little coin into a little slot and then it spins

and that's the number of pieces of these things

you get so it's like a little bit of a lottery 
you put in our note was too but I think it was

actually one but you put in one baht and you might 
get one two or three pieces of roti saimai so it

was like a little fun thing that we used to 
do and I think that's probably why I ended up

and it's basically black bean that's cooked in 
coconut milk poured over tapioca pearls mm-hmm

Wow it's been so long since I've had that that's
